cont.entity_a: Router reboots every few hours, even when there is no traffic. Router frequently disconnects itself from all computers and reboots, unresolved by firmware upgrades or network card replacement. Router frequently reboots or hangs, requiring unplugging and replugging. Router frequently drops wireless connection and sometimes reboots during use.
cont.entity_b: Router is extremely stable with fantastic range. Overheats and reboots every 30 seconds when stacked under a Dlink Switch. Router drops connection often and requires frequent unplugging and replugging.

cont.entity_a: Router drops wireless connection about once per hour, requiring VPN links to be re-established. Signal strength and quality is very inconsistent. Product description is misleading regarding 108Mbps speed, achievable only with other D-Link products. Stable connection speed of 108Mbps achieved with a Toshiba laptop's built-in Atheros super-G wireless card. Strong signals throughout a house with great speed and reasonable price. Installation was quick, but signal range is extremely poor beyond 30 feet.
cont.entity_b: Wireless signal strength is amazing and never drops. Secure and works great with multiple devices including Playstation 3, Xbox 360, and Netflix. Offers gigabit LAN speeds and a stable wireless connection. Handles a lot of connections without slowing down.

cont.entity_a: Wireless link Indicator LEDs do not behave as manuals describe.
cont.entity_b: Beautiful design with blue LEDs and black chromed finish.

cont.entity_a: Advanced features are not well described in the documentation, with no samples to use.
Installation is simple if instructions are followed. Easy to set up and configure, especially with DWL-G650 and updated software. Easy installation with strong signal throughout a two-story house.
cont.entity_b: Easiest router to set up with zero downtime except when rebooting for settings.

cont.entity_a: Router offers WEP and WPA encryption and is easy to manage.
cont.entity_b: Supports stronger WiFi encryption for wireless access points.

cont.entity_a: Compatible with VPN for connecting to company computers.
cont.entity_b: Works great with both X-Box Live and Nintendo Wi-Fi without additional setup. Device works flawlessly with D-Link DWL-G550 wireless PCI Card. Works great for gaming with Xbox Live.

cont.entity_a: Firmware updates and latest OS software are advisable for optimal performance.
cont.entity_b: Incredibly fast download and upload speeds with Comcast. Router is fast and reliable with advanced settings and extra NAT table space.

cont.entity_a: Router cannot configure any wireless channel but 6. Router has ongoing issues with handling PADT packet from ISP's equipment, leading to disconnects.
cont.entity_b: Does not support the new 802.11n specs but has a built-in MIMO system. Game Fuel feature supports VOIP nicely. Interface allows prioritizing packet routing from certain IP addresses. Gigabit switch and easy-to-use router interface.
